alert.note: Alert for Cascades in Lane County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 21 at 2:12PM PDT until October 22 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 11 PM PDT SATURDAY ABOVE 4000 FEET... * WHAT...Wet snow expected above 4000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 10 inches. * WHERE...Cascades in Lane County. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 11 PM PDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Willamette Pass along Highway 58 will likely be impacted by snow covered roads, especially early Saturday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heaviest accumulations will be above the Cascade passes.
info.instruction: Periods of snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Be prepared for snow covered roads and limited visibilities. Use caution while driving. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map
